backup_vocals_volume_change.description: Control volume of backup AI vocals.
backup_vocals_volume_change.title: Backup Vocals Volume Change

crepe_hop_length.description: When `pitch_detection_algo` is set to `mangio-crepe`, this controls how often it checks for pitch changes in milliseconds. Lower values lead to longer conversions and higher risk of voice cracks, but better pitch accuracy.
crepe_hop_length.title: Crepe Hop Length

custom_rvc_model_download_url.description: URL to download a custom RVC model. If provided, the model will be downloaded (if it doesn't already exist) and used for prediction, regardless of the 'rvc_model' value.
custom_rvc_model_download_url.title: Custom Rvc Model Download Url

filter_radius.description: If >=3: apply median filtering median filtering to the harvested pitch results.
filter_radius.title: Filter Radius

index_rate.description: Control how much of the AI's accent to leave in the vocals.
index_rate.title: Index Rate

instrumental_volume_change.description: Control volume of the background music/instrumentals.
instrumental_volume_change.title: Instrumental Volume Change

main_vocals_volume_change.description: Control volume of main AI vocals. Use -3 to decrease the volume by 3 decibels, or 3 to increase the volume by 3 decibels.
main_vocals_volume_change.title: Main Vocals Volume Change

output_format.description: wav for best quality and large file size, mp3 for decent quality and small file size.

pitch_change.description: Adjust pitch of AI vocals. Options: `no-change`, `male-to-female`, `female-to-male`.

pitch_change_all.description: Change pitch/key of background music, backup vocals and AI vocals in semitones. Reduces sound quality slightly.
pitch_change_all.title: Pitch Change All

pitch_detection_algorithm.description: Best option is rmvpe (clarity in vocals), then mangio-crepe (smoother vocals).

protect.description: Control how much of the original vocals' breath and voiceless consonants to leave in the AI vocals. Set 0.5 to disable.
protect.title: Protect

reverb_damping.description: Absorption of high frequencies in the reverb.
reverb_damping.title: Reverb Damping

reverb_dryness.description: Level of AI vocals without reverb.
reverb_dryness.title: Reverb Dryness

reverb_size.description: The larger the room, the longer the reverb time.
reverb_size.title: Reverb Size

reverb_wetness.description: Level of AI vocals with reverb.
reverb_wetness.title: Reverb Wetness

rms_mix_rate.description: Control how much to use the original vocal's loudness (0) or a fixed loudness (1).
rms_mix_rate.title: Rms Mix Rate

rvc_model.description: RVC model for a specific voice. If using a custom model, this should match the name of the downloaded model. If a 'custom_rvc_model_download_url' is provided, this will be automatically set to the name of the downloaded model.

post.description: Run a single prediction on the model

put.description: Run a single prediction on the model (idempotent creation).

schema.title: Response Cancel Predictions  Prediction Id  Cancel Post
